hanzi-su-wiki:
曾

Значения

Некогда, прежде, раньше

Мнемоника

Антоним знака собираться, т.е. расходиться. То, что было в прошлом, ранее. Увеличиваться, т.к. ушедшие приведут новых сторонников.

Варианты

曽
purpleculture_pinyin:
céng
once; already; ever (in the past); former; previously; (past tense marker used before verb or clause)
однажды; уже; когда-либо (в прошлом); бывший; ранее; (маркер прошедшего времени, используемый перед глаголом или предложением)

zēng
great- (grandfather, grandchild etc)
прадед (дед, внук и т. д.)
rtega_mnemonic:
曾曾RS曽already, sign of past
  • RS. something splits from 八 the fields 田 (which has been told 曰 to happen in the past) under the sun 日
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A rice cooker on heat 日, building up steam 丷 and letting it off
purpleculture_examples:
曾经 [ céng jīng ]: once; already; former; previously; ever; (past tense marker used before verb or clause)
不曾 [ bù céng ]: hasn't yet; hasn't ever
未曾 [ wèi céng ]: hasn't (or haven't); hasn't ever
曾几何时 [ céng jǐ hé shí ]: just a while before; not so long ago; everyone can remember when..
似曾相识 [ sì céng xiāng shí ]: déjà vu (the experience of seeing exactly the same situation a second time); seemingly familiar; apparently already acquainted
曾孙 [ zēng sūn ]: great-grandson
曾祖父 [ zēng zǔ fù ]: father's father's father; paternal great-grandfather
曾祖母 [ zēng zǔ mǔ ]: father's father's mother; paternal great-grandmother
曾祖 [ zēng zǔ ]: great-grandfather (father of one's paternal grandfather)
曾参 [ zēng shēn ]: Zeng Shen (505-435 BC), a.k.a. 曾子

Ru_trainchinese:
céng: (нареч) однажды, прежде
zēng: (графема) родственная связь между правнуками и прадедушкой/прабабушкой
zēng: (сущ) Цзэн (фамилия)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Formerly this brain wasn't so horny.  Now it sticks it tongue out at girls everywhere it goes.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Zeng " is like an ancient cooking appliance, "the lower body of the vessel holds water, the upper body holds rice, and there is a grate in the middle" (see Zhu Fangpu). The grate is the bamboo drawer in the steamer.

Duan Yucai said: "The steaming vessel of the retort has seven wearers at the bottom, and it must be covered by a bamboo mat (press: the grate), and the rice will not leak." The " Tian " form in the oracle bone script is like the grate of the zeng. This interpretation is reasonable. Because the grate is the characteristic of the zeng, it is represented by the character " Zeng " when it is made. As for the " eight " shape on the upper part of the oracle bone, it looks like steam rising up. In addition, in the early inscriptions on the oracle bone inscriptions, the word " kou " was added. One said that this " kou " image steamer, and the other said that the word " kou " was added in order to differentiate the character " Zeng " from the initial form of the oracle bone inscriptions as a country. name. In the bronze inscriptions, the " mouth " shape was later added to the pen to make the " gan " shape. In addition to false " gan " as " day " in seal script, the " tian " is also false. Nowadays, the form of " Zeng " is inherited from seal script.

The word "曾" was later phoned as a function word for "曾是" or "once". Xu Shen's "Shuowen": "Zeng, Ci Zhi Shu Ye. From Ba Cong Yue, 𡆧 sound." What this explanation reflects is actually only the false meaning of " Zeng ". Such as "The Book of Songs. Daya. What's going on? "Dang": "It used to be unwilling to listen, but life is to be bowed"; or "The Analects. Weizheng: "I used to think that filial piety!" are examples of function words.

Since the character " Zeng " was borrowed for a long time and could not be returned, later generations added the character "瓦" and made the character " Zeng " to preserve and convey its original meaning.

Precisely because Zeng Xiangzheng Zhongzhi separated the ware into two layers, the word " Zeng " often has a heavy meaning (Liu Heng). Such as " layer " ("Shuowen": "Chongwuya"), " Zeng " (Zengzhen are two devices on top of each other). "poetry. Zhou Song. Wei Tian Zhi Ming: "Great-grandson Duzhi" Zheng Xuanjian: "Zeng You Zhong Ye." "Er Ya. Shiqin": "The father of the grandfather is the father of the great grandfather and the king." (See Yang Shuda)
humanum_short_description_en: A Bronze like one kind of cooking Cooking, " was " is " retort beginning of the text (Zhu Fang Pu, Xu Shu, Dai Jiaxiang)" is. Borrowed later to mean once.
humanum_full_description:
「曾」象古代一種蒸煮器具，「其器下體承水，上體盛飯，中設一箅」（參朱芳圃），箅即蒸鍋中的竹屜。

　　段玉裁曰︰「甑者蒸飯之器，底有七穿，必以竹席（按︰即箅）蔽之，米乃不漏」。甲骨文字形中的「田」形即象甑之箅，此釋形合理，因為箅是甑的特徵，所以造「曾」字時便以此為代表。至於甲骨文字形上部的「八」形則象蒸氣上騰之狀。另外，早期金文於甲骨文本字下加「口」形，一說此「口」形象蒸鍋，一說加「口」為的是要把「曾」字從甲骨文之初形分化出來作為國名。金文中，後來「口」形增飾筆作「甘」形。篆文除了訛「甘」作「日」外，亦訛「田」，而如今「曾」字形乃承篆文之形。

　　「曾」字後來被假借為「曾是」或「曾經」的虛詞。許慎《說文》：「曾，詞之舒也。从八从曰，𡆧聲。」這一解釋所反映的，其實只是「曾」的假借義。如《詩經．大雅．蕩之什．蕩 》：「曾是莫聽，大命以傾」；或《論語．為政》：「曾是以為孝乎﹗」皆為用作虛詞的例子。

　　由於「曾」字久借不還，後世乃增義符「瓦」而作「甑」字以保存、傳達其初義。

　　正因為曾象甑中之箅將器隔為兩重，故从「曾」之字多有重義(劉恆)。如「層」(《說文》：「重屋也」)、「甑」(甑甗皆為兩器相疊)。《詩．周頌．維天之命》：「曾孫篤之」鄭玄箋：「曾猶重也。」《爾雅．釋親》：「祖之父曰曾祖王父。」(參楊樹達)
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象一種蒸煮炊器，「曾」是「甑」的初文(朱芳圃、徐中舒、戴家祥)。後借來表示曾經。

Chinese: Formerly this brain wasn't so horny. Now it sticks it tongue out at girls everywhere it goes.
Meaning: formerly
Story: Formerly this brain wasn't so horny. Now it sticks it tongue out at girls everywhere it goes.
Kind: both

「 曾 」象古代一種蒸煮器具，「其器下體承水，上體盛飯，中設一箅」（參朱芳圃），箅即蒸鍋中的竹屜。 段玉裁曰︰「甑者蒸飯之器，底有七穿，必以竹席（按︰即箅）蔽之，米乃不漏」。甲骨文字形中的「 田 」形即象甑之箅，此釋形合理，因為箅是甑的特徵，所以造「 曾 」字時便以此為代表。至於甲骨文字形上部的「 八 」形則象蒸氣上騰之狀。另外，早期金文於甲骨文本字下加「 口 」形，一說此「 口 」形象蒸鍋，一說加「 口 」為的是要把「 曾 」字從甲骨文之初形分化出來作為國名。金文中，後來「 口 」形增飾筆作「 甘 」形。篆文除了訛「 甘 」作「 日 」外，亦訛「 田 」，而如今「 曾 」字形乃承篆文之形。 「 曾 」字後來被假借為「曾是」或「曾經」的虛詞。許慎《說文》：「曾，詞之舒也。从八从曰，𡆧聲。」這一解釋所反映的，其實只是「 曾 」的假借義。如《詩經．大雅．蕩之什．蕩 》：「曾是莫聽，大命以傾」；或《論語．為政》：「曾是以為孝乎﹗」皆為用作虛詞的例子。 由於「 曾 」字久借不還，後世乃增義符「 瓦 」而作「 甑 」字以保存、傳達其初義。 正因為曾象甑中之箅將器隔為兩重，故从「 曾 」之字多有重義(劉恆)。如「 層 」(《說文》：「重屋也」)、「 甑 」(甑甗皆為兩器相疊)。《詩．周頌．維天之命》：「曾孫篤之」鄭玄箋：「曾猶重也。」《爾雅．釋親》：「祖之父曰曾祖王父。」(參楊樹達)
" Zeng" is like an ancient cooking appliance, "the lower body of the vessel holds water, the upper body holds rice, and there is a grate in the middle" (see Zhu Fangpu). The grate is the bamboo drawer in the steamer. Duan Yucai said: "The steaming vessel of the retort has seven wearers at the bottom, and it must be covered by a bamboo mat (press: the grate), and the rice will not leak." The " Tian" form in the oracle bone script is like the grate of the zeng. This interpretation is reasonable. Because the grate is the characteristic of the zeng, it is represented by the character " Zeng" when it is made. As for the " eight" shape on the upper part of the oracle bone, it looks like steam rising up. In addition, in the early inscriptions on the oracle bone inscriptions, the word " kou" was added. One said that this " kou" image steamer, and the other said that the word" kou" was added in order to differentiate the character " Zeng" from the initial form of the oracle bone inscriptions as a country. name. In the bronze inscriptions, the " mouth" shape was later added to the pen to make the " gan" shape. In addition to false " gan" as " day" in seal script, the " tian" is also false. Nowadays, the form of " Zeng" is inherited from seal script. The word " 曾" was later phoned as a function word for "曾是" or "once". Xu Shen's "Shuowen": "Zeng, Ci Zhi Shu Ye. From Ba Cong Yue, 𡆧 sound." What this explanation reflects is actually only the false meaning of " Zeng". Such as "The Book of Songs. Daya. What's going on? "Dang": "It used to be unwilling to listen, but life is to be bowed"; or "The Analects. Weizheng: "I used to think that filial piety!" are examples of function words. Since the character " Zeng" was borrowed for a long time and could not be returned, later generations added the character " 瓦" and made the character " Zeng" to preserve and convey its original meaning. Precisely because Zeng Xiangzheng Zhongzhi separated the ware into two layers, the word " Zeng" often has a heavy meaning (Liu Heng). Such as " layer" ("Shuowen": "Chongwuya"), " Zeng" (Zengzhen are two devices on top of each other). "poetry. Zhou Song. Wei Tian Zhi Ming: "Great-grandson Duzhi" Zheng Xuanjian: "Zeng You Zhong Ye." "Er Ya. Shiqin": "The father of the grandfather is the father of the great grandfather and the king." (See Yang Shuda)

曾字的基本解释

曾
zēng
指与自己中间隔两代的亲属：曾祖父。曾孙。
古同“增”，增加。
竟，简直，还（h俰 ）：“以君之力曾不能损魁父之丘，如太山、王屋何？”
姓。

曾
céng
尝，表示从前经历过：曾经。未曾。何曾。曾几何时。
古同“层”，重（ch巒g ）。

曾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zēng］
［《廣韻》作滕切，平登，精。］
(1)副词。乃；竟。
(2)副词。则。表示相承。
(3)副词。岂；难道。
(4)副词。一直；从来。
(5)代词。表示疑问。相当于“何”、“怎”。
(6)重。指中间隔两代的亲属。参见“曾孫”、“曾祖”。
(7)谦词。犹末。参见“曾臣”。
(8)通“”。举起翅膀；飞举。
(9)通“增”。增长；增加。
(10)通“橧”。参见“曾巢”。
(11)通“憎”。厌恶；恨。
(12)姓。春秋时有曾参。见《史记·仲尼弟子列传》。
[②]［céng］
［《廣韻》昨棱切，平登，從。］
(1)副词。尝；曾经。
(2)深。参见“曾2曲”、“曾2潭”。
(3)通“層”。重叠。
(4)通“層”。高。

曾字的英文翻译

◎ 曾
ever

曾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【曰字部】　曾； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页503第03
【唐韻】昨稜切【集韻】【韻會】徂稜切，?音層。【說文】詞之舒也。从八从曰?聲。【九經字樣】曾从?。?，古文窻字。下从曰，上从八，象氣之分散也。經典相承，隷省作曾。【詩·大雅】曾莫惠我師。【論語】曾是以爲孝乎。【孟子】爾何曾比予於是。　又【廣韻】經也。【增韻】嘗也。【韻會】乃也，則也。　又與層通。【後漢·張衡傳】登閬風之曾城兮。【文選】作層城。　又【廣韻】作滕切【集韻】【韻會】咨騰切，?音增。【書·武成】惟有道曾孫周王發。【爾雅·釋親】王父之考爲曾祖，孫之子爲曾孫。【註】曾，猶重也。　又【左傳·襄十八年】曾臣彪將率諸侯以討焉。【註】曾臣，猶末臣。【疏】曾祖曾孫者，曾爲重義。諸侯之於天子，無所可重。曾臣猶末臣，謙?之意耳。　又【楚辭·九歌】翾飛兮翠曾。【註】曾，舉也。　又與橧同。【禮·禮運】夏則居橧巢。【釋文】橧，本又作曾。　又與增同。【孟子】曾益其所不能。【孫奭·音義】曾當讀作增。　又姓。【姓氏急就篇】曾氏出於鄫，姒姓，莒滅鄫，子孫在魯者別爲曾氏。

曾字的源字形

曾字的起名意思

：指从前经历过；与自己中间隔两代的亲属；竟、简直、还，姓氏。

[①]［zēng］
["Guangyun" made Tengqie, Pingdeng, Jing. ]
(1) Adverbs. Is; actually.
(2) Adverbs. then. Indicates mutual succession.
(3) Adverbs. Isn't it?
(4) Adverbs. Always; never.
(5) Pronouns. Express doubts. It is equivalent to "He" and "How".
(6) Heavy. Refers to relatives separated by two generations. See "great grandson", "great grandson".
(7) Modest words. Judah. See "Zeng Chen".
(8) Through "". Lift up wings; fly up.
(9) Through "increase". Increase; increase.
(10) Through "橧". See "Zeng Chao".
(11) Through "hate". Hate; hate.
(12) Last name. There were ginseng in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Historical Records · Biography of Zhongni's Disciples".
[②]［céng］
["Guangyun" was cut yesterday, flattened, from. ]
(1) Adverbs. Taste; ever.
(2) Deep. See "Zeng 2 Songs", "Zeng 2 Tans".
(3) Through the "layer". overlapping.
(4) Through the "layer". high.

Name meaning
: Refers to the relatives who have been in the past; two generations apart from oneself; Jing, Jin, Huan, surname.
* zēng,céng
[附]甑 zeng 增 zeng 层(層)ceng
金
文
“曾”是“甑”(zeng)的本字。这
是古代的一种蒸食物的炊器,特点是
中层有一些透蒸气的小孔,有如现代
的蒸笼。“曾”字后来多用作虚词,于
是另造“甑”字以表本义。“曾”有时
书
行
书
也通“增”、“层”(層)。
(同楷书)

一简化字
會曾
* zēng, céng
[Прикреплено] Zeng zeng Zeng zeng layer (слой) ceng
золото
Текст
«曾» - оригинальное слово для «甑» (цзэн).
Это своего рода плита для приготовления пищи на пару в древности, она отличается небольшими отверстиями для пара в среднем слое, как в современной пароварке.
Позже иероглиф «Цзэн» в основном использовался как функциональное слово, поэтому иероглиф «Цзэн» был создан для выражения первоначального значения.
«Цзэн» иногда означает «добавление» и «слой» (слой).
два
Как
для
Упрощенное слово
Уилл Цзэн
céng, zēng
I служебное слово
1) céng уже некогда; как-то раз; в своё время (перед глаголом указывает на несовершенный или несовершенно-многократный аспект действия)
这里不曾见他 здесь его видеть не приходилось, он здесь не появлялся
对此现象未曾注意 на это явление не обращали внимания
他因工作积极, 曾被本厂评模范 он работал активно, в связи с чем и был квалифицирован фабрикой как образцовый работник
曾有 бывало, что..., как-то случилось, что
2) zēng * и вот; а; ведь, а ведь
曾是在位 а вот эти - занимают посты
曾是莫聼 а ведь их никто не слушал
强者田以千数，弱者曾无立锥之居 сильные считают свои поля тысячами, а вот у слабых нет места, куда можно было бы воткнуть шило
3) среднекит. как?, каким образом?, откуда?
此身安否, 更曾知? как (откуда) можно бы узнать дальнейшую судьбу свою (будет ли тебе спокойно или нет)
II céng сущ.
вм. 层 (этаж,ярус;слой;пласт)
III прил.
1) céng * наложенный слоями, многослойный, нагромождённый; массивный, тяжёлый
曾台累榭 высящиеся башни и поднимающиеся одна за другой вышки (на башнях)
曾闳 массивный и огромный, тяжёлый и большой
2) zēng * глубокий; крайний, последний
IV zēng гл.
* вм. 增 (увеличивать,прибавлять)
V zēng собств.
Цзэн (фамилия)
曾闵 Цзэн и Минь (вм.曾参 и 闵损, примерные сыновья)
VI zēng словообр.
в названиях степеней родства соответствует приставке пра- в русском языке
曾祖父 прадед
曾孙 правнук

曾

Значения

Некогда, прежде, раньше

Мнемоника

Антоним знака собираться, т.е. расходиться. То, что было в прошлом, ранее. Увеличиваться, т.к. ушедшие приведут новых сторонников.
